Description: The following statement contains a magic number: for (int left = n - 2; left >= start; left--) {  	for (int right = left + 1; right < n; right++) {  		if (arr [left] != arr [right]) {  			Swap (ref arr [left]' ref arr [right]);  			PermuteAndPrint (arr' left + 1' n);  		}  	}  	var firstElement = arr [left];  	for (int i = left; i < n - 1; i++) {  		arr [i] = arr [i + 1];  	}  	arr [n - 1] = firstElement;  }
